title: If this is you: Fuck you
author: onyxandcake

comments.author: relaxlu
comments.body: If you want to buy yourself a r/pics mod position or a place on the front page for your product then please contact us with your highest toilet paper bids.

comments.author: cHaOsReX
comments.body: Pro tip: If you stop drinking hand sanitizer you won't shit so much.

comments.author: Tarchannen
comments.body: Can someone explain the panic over toilet paper recently? I understand that it's somehow COVID-19 related, but were people not wiping their bums before the virus was a concern?

comments.author: OldWitchOfCuba
comments.body: These dudes look like heavy shitters though

comments.author: Monster-Zero
comments.body:
My absolute favorite thing about this is that while every store in a 10 mile radius around me is sold out of TP, they all still have plenty of hand soap.

Priorities.

comments.author: peculiar_liar
comments.body: Every couple of weeks I go to Costco to buy TP for my workplace - it is a remote construction site with a crew of over 70 people. I usually buy three Kirkland packs at a time - and now I am dreading my next shopping trip cause I will look like a complete and utter idiot.

comments.author: Mythradites
comments.body: Panic at the Costco

comments.author: DarkGamer
comments.body: When you're an asshole you need a lot of TP

comments.author: Sparty013
comments.body: If this is you: why? What the hell do you think is about to happen? Do you anticipate pissing out your ass for the next 3 straight years?

comments.author: Noogatuck
comments.body:
I just don't understand this, at all. People act like the supply chains have shut down and no more TP is being made, you fucking idiots realize there's another semi, on the way, WITH MORE TP, WATER AND RAMEN RIGHT? 

Even in Italy and China where we've seen the worst of this so far, HOW MANY PEOPLE HAVE REPORTED THEY COULDN'T SHIT? NONE. You know how many people have reported they couldn't shit because some asshole bought all the TP? A LOT.

Buy a bidet everybody, it's on Amazon for like $30 and you'll only need like 2 squares of TP for every shit after that, for eternity. If your store is out of lysol wipes, buy the spray bottle and use a cleaning rag. If they run out of bottled water, buy a filter for your tap.

Jesus, everybody who's panicking and doing all of this stuff, just stop. Think about the community at large and how you're impacting it.

comments.author: Arayder
comments.body: I’ve tested positive for corona??? But how is that possible??? I bought so much toilet paper!!!!

comments.author: Monkeyboystevey
comments.body:
I would be embarrassed as fuck buying two packs for self isolation for my family of 5 let alone 10.  
Fuck these people...

comments.author: ejsandstrom
comments.body: I have a few rolls left. I am wondering what I am going to do in a few days.

comments.author: De5perad0
comments.body:
Bidet gang represent!



Edit: it seems the best bidets on Amazon are sold out  I WONDER WHY!

comments.author: onyxandcake
comments.body:
~~My~~ A town has a seniors lodge that is currently outsourcing toilet paper from local residents, asking each household to donate a couple rolls. They shouldn't be in this situation in the first place.

Edit: Not my town, turns out, but a nearby one. Local Facebook groups aren't the greatest for accuracy. Point still stands. 

**Photo credit @seanbradbery on Twitter**

Edit2: [Someone's taking it personally](https://ibb.co/ZMs1TTd)

comments.author: Mecmecmecmecmec
comments.body: I’m literally just in the market for toilet paper like usual...and can’t find a single fucking roll

comments.author: t1t50rgtf0
comments.body:
Stores should be responsible and put limits on how many you can buy

Wow 2k upvotes and an award! I never thought my best comment would be about toilet paper 😄

comments.author: unicornsRhardcore
comments.body:
I feel like the people who buy all the toilet paper are not the people who would survive a real apocalypse.

Edit: Damn, first award kind person!

comments.author: LMBH1234182
comments.body:
Me and my roommates are ACTUALLY out of toilet paper and can’t find it anywhere. In Austin. Where there are a grand total of two people with corona. FUCK THESE ASSHOLES.

Edit: ok fine there’s more than 2 cases but my point still stands.

comments.author: EmptyCalories
comments.body:
[https://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-coronavirus-toiletpaper/rationing-and-robbery-coronavirus-outbreak-sparks-toilet-roll-panic-idUSKBN20T0YG](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-coronavirus-toiletpaper/rationing-and-robbery-coronavirus-outbreak-sparks-toilet-roll-panic-idUSKBN20T0YG)

>“The size of toilet paper makes it feel like a substantial, big  purchase. It makes it feel like you’re doing something. It taps back  into that need for control. If you’re buying a hefty big pack of toilet  paper, you kind of feel like you’re ‘stocking up’. You signify to  yourself that you’re in control.”

Meanwhile everyone with a bidet has a smile, and not just from the bidet.  :)  People hoarding toilet paper concerns me, a little.  I'll become worried when there's a shortage of penicillin and hamburgers.

comments.author: GowWowGoliath
comments.body: Except for that dude on the left. He looks like he drops them huge shit hammers that just go KERPLUNK.

comments.author: damn_yank
comments.body:
FFS, how much do these people think they are going to shit?

EDIT: I would never have thought in a million years that one of my highest rated comments would be in a post about hoarding toilet paper.

comments.author: mikehaysjr
comments.body: My buddy works at a sporting goods store, and when their limited supply of TP ran out people literally started buying up all the guns and ammo

comments.author: doglywolf
comments.body:
The supply chain is fine - the stores are fine its all the panic shopping that clears the shelfs  - normally the shelfs are enough for a 3-4 days so that swhat the trucks bring .  

When people come in all at one and clear the shelfs - they stock them same day and clear them again - it will be next day at worst 2 for them to restock but all of sudden their are pictures of empty shelfs and people panic even more and go into a buying frenzy and it just repeats - there is more then enough for everyone and if you didnt buy 10x more then you need for your selfish self theere would still be enough for everyone and then some and there would be no panic. 

​

This panic is 100% caused by selfish ignorant people over buying , and half the stuff they overbought will go to waste

comments.author: Mustermuss
comments.body: Can someone explain to me why people are stocking up on TP’s? People have gone mad.

comments.author: _nayr_tremmin_
comments.body: i work in a grocery store and today was probably the worst shift ever in my 3 1/2 years there. idiots

comments.author: Dose_One
comments.body: As someone with a wife and 3 daughters this looks like a solid weeks supply for 4 women.
buying mass toilet paper is the stupidest trend i have seen in my lifetime.

comments.author: MeanwhileOnReddit
comments.body: These people are going to be confused when they still have a ridiculous amount of TP in 6 months.

comments.author: Tenagaaaa
comments.body: In this picture, people who don’t wash their ass.

comments.author: annoyinglyskeptical
comments.body:
All y’all fucking rookies hoarding the TP when you should be hoarding the baby wipes.

Edit- it’s a joke people. I don’t condone the hoarding of anything right now. I don’t see a point in it.

Edit 2- so I thought this TP hoarding was a joke. A meme. I just went to Walmart to get some groceries and holy shit these turds are REALLY hoarding TP

comments.author: artisticMink
comments.body:
Fallout had it wrong with the bottlecaps. 

In the post-apocalyptic distopia, the toilet paper prepper is king.

comments.author: TheTattedspyder
comments.body: What. The. Fuck. Does. TP. Have. To. Do. With. COVID-19?

comments.author: katehaxu
comments.body: there should be a limit.

comments.author: HRHqueenbee
comments.body: My father who is in his 70s is going through cancer treatment.  One of his side effects from his medication is he poops a lot.  Like a lot.  I went to grocery store for him other day since I don’t want him out in public.  I bought two big pack of TP which will honestly probably not last that long.  I got glares and death stares.  Some of these people might be buying for other people or have medical issues as well.  Most are asshats hoarding TP because they are panicking and dumb.   But some might not be.  Just wanted to put that out there.

comments.author: Slade_Riprock
comments.body: Three are fuckers selling shit on eBay and Facebook marketplace. Shitty humans

comments.author: phatmattd
comments.body:
These people aren't stocking up like this to prepare for isolation. They're "stocking up" like this to resell knowing that store stock will be out for a while. 

Go check your local Facebook Marketplace, you'll see all of these assholes listing 1 or 9 packs for $10-$50, it's absolutely absurd.

comments.author: Crucial_Taunt94
comments.body: 😂😂😂 these people are the last ones to survive any apocalyptic like scenario

comments.author: AntonDorado
comments.body: I suppose it takes a crisis to learn just how full-of-shit your neighbors are

comments.author: iPhoneSEcretActnt
comments.body: Covid-19 isn’t gonna give you diarrhea, what the fuck is wrong with people?

comments.author: gsuEAGLE21
comments.body: My boss makes a dollar, and I made a dime.  That's why I poop on company time.

comments.author: cosmic_riviera
comments.body: Diarrhea is not a symptom of coronavirus. I don’t understand.

comments.author: AidilAfham42
comments.body:
Y’know, this virus made me realize you Westerners are exactly the same as us asians. Fear to lose out, doing what others do, reselling for profit. Kinda brings us all together.

Well except I can’t understand why people wipe their assholes with paper then walk off. Why don’t you wash it? You’re at home, go shit to shower. Use soap. All that shit stuck in between the wrinkly rectum and ass hair. How do you walk around like that? But then again you guys wear shoes from the outside directly into your own house, so you guys are really strange.

comments.author: spdrv89
comments.body: The media is one helluva drug

comments.author: RealM-Fresh
comments.body: It's times like these that make us realize the human race really is no better than the residents of South Park

comments.author: mysticalfruit
comments.body:
What saddens me more is these clowns are likely going to stash it in some place, like their damp cellar and it'll all be wasted.

This is my fear with people buying 8lbs of rice and 40lbs of flour. These clowns don't know how to cook from scratch. How do I know this? The flour is gone, but the baking powder, baking soda and yeast is still there.. It's going to end up in the back of the pantry until it's chucked.
